item.description:
Join us for some pool and appetizers @ Big City in Allston. Shoot some pool and mix and mingle. All levels welcome. It's a great way to unwind and meet new or old friends after the short and hot work week. We will reserve pool tables according to the number of RSVP. Please sign in and pay when you arrive.

We encourage new members to come to this event. There will be a door prize for new members (anyone who has joined in 2010).

Time: 7pm - 10 pm.
Cost: $10 for both food and pool

Afterwards we can go and get some froyo nearby.

How to get there by MBTA - take Green Line B train to Harvard Ave and walk 3 blocks to Brighton Ave.

By Car - parking can be tough in this area, but you can usually find a spot on Harvard Ave or Brighton Ave.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: TGIF Pool Night at Big City
